originalText.text: The team at Mini were excellent. They walked me through all my leasing options in detail and helped me throughout the process of customizing my car order. Joe was the best at sending all the information and updates about my car before delivery. Thank you!

text.text: The team at Mini were excellent. They walked me through all my leasing options in detail and helped me throughout the process of customizing my car order. Joe was the best at sending all the information and updates about my car before delivery. Thank you!

originalText.text: Joseph has always been sincere, kind and attentive. Never feel pressured working with him, and always welcoming and warm with his high energy spirit and get me the nest possible deal. He truly is a gem.

text.text: Joseph has always been sincere, kind and attentive. Never feel pressured working with him, and always welcoming and warm with his high energy spirit and get me the nest possible deal. He truly is a gem.

originalText.text: I have the best experience ever. Jordan, salesman, was amazing and knowledgeable. Mateo at theb finance dept was great and Mousa was very detailed and explained everything about the car. Thanks for such a smooth and easy experience.  We love our countryman untamed mini cooper.

text.text: I have the best experience ever. Jordan, salesman, was amazing and knowledgeable. Mateo at theb finance dept was great and Mousa was very detailed and explained everything about the car. Thanks for such a smooth and easy experience.  We love our countryman untamed mini cooper.

originalText.text:
Initially, my experience with Mini of Manhattan was great, pick up & drop off was very smooth - unfortunately, that was it. I am very upset that after only 300 miles, my check engine light is now and I'm getting alerts that the drive train is malfunctioning again, which they had assured me was fixed. This was apparently a lie and waste of time and money for their “full assessment.”

On 12/24, I had emailed the service rep I had worked with directly and replied to the text I received to inform them of the issue (I understand it was Christmas Eve, but wanted to alert Mini of the situation as it unfolded), it is now the 1/4 and have yet to hear anything back.

This is extremely frustrating, since Mini just serviced my car and had to scramble to figure out holiday travels. I was very hopeful that working with a different service center, I would have a more positive experience. The previous dealership I had worked with was a nightmare to work with, but it seems this is a consistent Mini experience, regardless of service center I take my car to.

The sad part is that they beg to not post negative reviews and to address issues with them directly. However, even following that request, Mini has no follow through or a shred of concern for their customers. Most disappointing and would never recommend Mini to anyone.

originalText.text:
This is our 4th MINI that we lease.
We couldn’t have had a better service from Jordan!
He was a gentleman, kind, patient, professional, thorough. He made all this 4th process to lease a car a real pleasure.
Also Moises was extremely kind and helpful in explaining everything when we had to pick up the new car.
